programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sight Unseen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E13, SG-1 returns from a mission with an artifact that triggers the ability to see hideous yet harmless life forms in a parallel reality. As the effect spreads to civilians, O'Neill and his team must find a solution before mass hysteria breaks out.

programme.title: Smoke & Mirrors
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E14, Senator Kinsey suffers an assassination attempt while campaigning for the presidency, and O'Neill is caught on tape leaving the building where the shots were fired. With O'Neill behind bars, Carter, Teal'c and Jonas must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E15, Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E16, SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E01, As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E02, Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

Menendez: Blood Brothers, 20250803040000 +0000, The inner lives and motivations behind Lyle and Eric Menendez's murder of their father and mother.
